title: Mobile Learning Program for Early Cancer Detection

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Cancer Prevention Knowledge and Fundamental Smartphone Operation Skills
context.additional_context: Education program for workplace health promotion and early cancer detection competency enhancement. Blended learning combining mobile applications and offline activities

learning_goals: Learners can explain the importance of early cancer detection and five major symptoms.
Learners can practice breast self-examination methods using smartphone applications with 80% accuracy.
Learners can systematically organize and explain the step-by-step process of early cervical cancer screening to peers.
Learners can form teams to create and present a community cancer prevention campaign proposal.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
